pages.text: While originally created as a set of playing cards, that use for these cards has faded into obscurity. They are often associated with telling fortunes, and we will discuss the meanings of them here.
The Enderman, a horrific spiritual entity. This card signifies that one may have some ties to the outer realms...
The Diamond, a priceless jewel, this signifies that one has been given a good fortune. If reversed however, one will run into bad luck.
